semantics.label: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: These options will let you control the behaviour.

fields.label: Enable retry?
fields.description: Tick off this if you want the user to be able to retry

fields.label: Pre-populate the statements
fields.description: The user starts off with the statements already ordered

fields.label: Allow users to add their own statements
fields.description: Lets the user add their own statements

fields.label: Display the provided comments below the statement
fields.description: If the user has provided a comment, this is shown in the statements list

fields.label: Show summary
fields.description: Do you want the user to provide a summary explaining the reasons for his/her answers

fields.label: Placeholder for the text boxes
fields.default: Type your reasons for such answers

fields.label: Label for the "Continue"-button in the restart dialog
Label for the "Cancel"-button in the restart dialog
Inform the user that data will be lost if he/she continues
fields.default: All the changes will be lost. Are you sure you wish to continue?

fields.label: Text displayed in 'Submit'-button when creating a document
Header in 'Restart' popover
fields.default: Are you sure you wish to restart?

fields.label: Placeholder for the summary box
fields.default: Give a brief summary in your own words

fields.label: Label when no summary is provided
Name of the statements column
fields.description: This is the column with the statements you provide

fields.label: Name of the prioritized column
fields.description: This is the column where the statements are put in an order

fields.label: Message read to the screen reader when drag is moved within the same list
fields.default: You have moved the item from position :startPosition to position :endPosition of :listLength

fields.label: Message read to the screen reader when drag is moved to another list
fields.default: You have moved the item from list :startListName in position :startPosition of :startListLength to list :destinationListName in position :destinationPosition of :destinationListLength

fields.label: Message read to the screen reader before entering the section with the statements
